alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 10:25PM EST until January 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations between a glaze and one tenth of an inch. The location with the greatest chance for snow accumulation is northern Berrien County. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Chances for freezing rain will increase late this evening into the overnight. The best chances of additional snow accumulation will be across southwest Lower Michigan overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
